Thanks once again for the upload Neon. More people should thank you for all the great work you do!

Just a quick question. Is the Release Lounge still active as their website seems to indicate that they have retired from the ripping/uploading scene. Do you know what's going on?

Much respect to release-Lounge for their effort in bringing us entertainment it is much appreciated mate and cheers to all else involved in making this happen and big shout out to ET the place to be. oh, and seed people DON'T HIT AND RUN
